description.narrative: The Small Grant Scheme North Pacific initiative provides support for delivery of small grants to the North Pacific countries of Federated States of Micronesia (FSM), Republic of Marshall Islands (RMI) and Republic of Palau (ROP). Funds support the North Pacific Partnership for Development and Non-Government Organisation (NGO) and community based projects through the small grants scheme to help reduce poverty and achieve sustainable development. The total value of this initiative is $0.5 million expensed in the 2011-12 financial year.
